item.text: Then Pharisees and experts in the law came from Jerusalem to Jesus and said,

“<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3845" class="">disobey</st> the <st data-num="3862" class="">tradition</st> of the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> they <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">wash</st> their<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>.”<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “And <st data-num="1223 5101">why</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3845" class="">disobey</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3862" class="">tradition</st>?
For God said, ‘Honor your father and mother’ and ‘Whoever insults his father or mother must be put to death.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘If <st data-num="3739" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">tells</st> his <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>, “<st data-num="3739 1437">Whatever</st> help you would have <st data-num="5623" class="">received</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> is <st data-num="1435">given</st> to God,”<n id="1" />

he does <st data-num="3756">not</st> need to <st data-num="5091">honor</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="3962">father</st>.’<n id="1" /> You have <st data-num="208" class="">nullified</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223">on account of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3862" class="">tradition</st>.
Hypocrites! Isaiah prophesied correctly about you when he said,

“‘This people honors me with their lips,

but their heart is far from me,

and they worship me in vain,

teaching as doctrines the commandments of men.’”
Then he called the crowd to him and said, “Listen and understand.

What <st data-num="2840" class="">defiles</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> what <st data-num="1525" class="">goes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth;</st> it is what<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1607">comes out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2840" class="">defiles</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st>.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “Do you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> when the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this <st data-num="3056" class="">saying</st> they were <st data-num="4624" class="">offended</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3956">Every</st> <st data-num="5452" class="">plant</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3770" class="">heavenly</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5452" class="">plant</st> will be <st data-num="1610" class="">uprooted</st>.

<st data-num="863" class="">Leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>! They <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st> <st data-num="3595" class="">guides</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> someone who is <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st> <st data-num="3594" class="">leads</st> another who is <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="297" class="">both</st> will <st data-num="4098" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="999" class="">pit</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5419">Explain</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st> <st data-num="3850" class="">parable</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.”

<st data-num="3588">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2532">Even</st> <st data-num="188">after all this</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> still so <st data-num="801" class="">foolish</st>?

<st data-num="3756">Don’t</st> you <st data-num="3539" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">whatever</st> <st data-num="1531" class="">goes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="5562">enters</st> the <st data-num="2836" class="">stomach</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="1544">passes out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="856" class="">sewer</st>?<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the things that <st data-num="1607">come out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, <st data-num="2548">and these things</st> <st data-num="2840" class="">defile</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1261" class="">ideas</st>, <st data-num="5408" class="">murder</st>, <st data-num="3430" class="">adultery</st>, <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>, <st data-num="2829" class="">theft</st>, <st data-num="5577">false testimony</st>, <st data-num="988" class="">slander</st>.
These are the things that defile a person; it is not eating with unwashed hands that defiles a person.”
After going out from there, Jesus went to the region of Tyre and Sidon.

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5478" class="">Canaanite</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3725" class="">area</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">came</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="2896">cried out</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="1653">Have mercy</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>! <st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st> is <st data-num="2560" class="">horribly</st> <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> a <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="2065" class="">begged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="630" class="">Send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="630">away</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> she keeps on <st data-num="2896">crying out</st> <st data-num="3693" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “I was <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1508">only</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="622" class="">lost</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> of the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> she <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="4352">bowed down</st><n id="1" /> before <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="997" class="">help</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

“It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">right</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="5043" class="">children’s</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">throw</st> it to the <st data-num="2952" class="">dogs</st>,”<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>.<n id="3" />

“<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,” she <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1063">but</st> even the <st data-num="2952" class="">dogs</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="5589" class="">crumbs</st> that <st data-num="4098" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">masters’</st> <st data-num="5132" class="">table</st>.”
Then Jesus answered her, “Woman, your faith is great! Let what you want be done for you.” And her daughter was healed from that hour.
When he left there, Jesus went along the Sea of Galilee. Then he went up a mountain, where he sat down.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1438">them</st> the <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st>, <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="2948" class="">crippled</st>, <st data-num="2974" class="">mute</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st>. They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4496" class="">laid</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
As a result, the crowd was amazed when they saw the mute speaking, the crippled healthy, the lame walking, and the blind seeing, and they praised the God of Israel.

Then Jesus called his disciples and said, “I have compassion on the crowd because they have already been here with me three days and they have nothing to eat. I don’t want to send them away hungry since they may faint on the way.”

The <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4159">Where</st> can <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> get <st data-num="5118" class="">enough</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> this <st data-num="2047">desolate place</st> to <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfy</st> <st data-num="5118">so great</st> a <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4214">How many</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> do you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="2033">Seven</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">few</st> <st data-num="2485">small fish</st>.”

After <st data-num="3853" class="">instructing</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> to <st data-num="377">sit down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>,

he <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> after <st data-num="2168">giving thanks</st>, he <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st> them <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began <st data-num="1325" class="">giving</st> them to the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="3101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1161">then</st> gave them to the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st>.<n id="1" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfied</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="142" class="">picked up</st> the <st data-num="2801" class="">broken pieces</st> <st data-num="4052">left over</st>, <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="4711" class="">baskets</st> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st>.

<st data-num="5565">Not counting</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st>,<n id="1" /> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="5070">4,000</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> who <st data-num="2068" class="">ate</st>.<n id="2" />
After sending away the crowd, he got into the boat and went to the region of Magadan.
